questions.name: What is a primary key in a database?
questions.solution: A unique identifier for table records

questions.name: Explain why normalization is important.
questions.solution: It reduces redundancy and improves data integrity.

questions.name: Suggest a scenario requiring a composite key.
questions.solution: When multiple fields together uniquely identify a record.
